subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Óscar Pereiro, who finished second in last year’s Tour de France to Floyd Landis, is still waiting for Landis’s drug test results to be upheld before he can be named the winner.
snippet: Óscar Pereiro, who finished second in last year’s Tour de France to Floyd Landis, is still waiting for Landis’s drug test results to be upheld before he can be named the winner.
